show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

header.title: Health at Gunpoint- the FDA’s Silent War Against Health Freedom

title: Health at Gunpoint- the FDA’s Silent War Against Health Freedom
content:
Ellen Kamhi, PhD, RN, www.naturalnurse.com, interviews James J. Gormley. James is an award-winning journalist, editor and consumer advocate with twenty years of experience in health and the natural products field.
His articles have appeared in consumer magazines and scientific journals, and he has helped lead a number of important grassroots campaigns, including the recent consumer petition campaign to protect nutritional ingredients from FDA over-reach.
He has managed regulatory submissions to the FDA and the European Food Safety Authority and has served on the US delegation to FAO/WHO Codex Alimentarius Commission meetings in Paris and Rome.
Gormley is the author of five other books, including The User’s Guide to Brain-Boosting Supplements.  On todays show, we discuss his new book, Health at Gunpoint, the FDA’s Silent War against Health Freedom Contact: http://jamesgormley.com
